fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Digital Single Market, EU VAT Regulations on e-services, VATMOSS and cross-border transactions
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Small business start-up promoting re-use of vintage electronics and retro computers, rather than them being thrown away. 
 
We operate through offering a dedicated marketplace and also actively taking part in various online forums for the promotion and assistance of users of vintage electronics and retro computers.
